p: Statistical analyses were performed using IBM SPSS statistic for Windows, version 21 (IBM Corp., Armonk, NY). The analysis was conducted by dividing individuals into three age groups (15–29, 30–59 and > 59years old). Rate of RV infection was compared between three periods of time (July 2016-June 2017, July 2017-June 2018, July 2018-December 2019). A Chi-square table was used to compare the percentages of infected individuals between age groups and studied periods. All comparisons were two-sided and p-value < 0.05 was considered to be statistically significant.
